content.content: 1. (1) The wards described in the Schedule are established for the City of Hamilton incorporated under section 2 of the Act, effective January 1, 2001. O. Reg. 448/00, s. 1 (1). (2) A reference to the City of Hamilton, City of Stoney Creek, the Township of Glanbrook, the Town of Ancaster, the Town of Dundas and the Town of Flamborough in the Schedule is a reference to those municipalities as they exist on the day this Regulation is filed. O. Reg. 448/00, s. 1 (2). Schedule
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The wards described in the Schedule are established for the City of Hamilton incorporated under section 2 of the Act, effective January 1, 2001. O. Reg. 448/00, s. 1 (1).

(2) A reference to the City of Hamilton, City of Stoney Creek, the Township of Glanbrook, the Town of Ancaster, the Town of Dundas and the Town of Flamborough in the Schedule is a reference to those municipalities as they exist on the day this Regulation is filed. O. Reg. 448/00, s. 1 (2).

Schedule
